description:
A great solution for sport and trad climbers who want a light, compact rope with great handling characteristics. A heat treatment ensures the rope will not shrink over time.

  • Thermo Shield treatment gives it excellent handling properties, a supple feel and an impressive strength rating
  • 3D lap coiled so it can be used straight out of the package without having to pre-flake it
  • EcoDry finish durably water-repellent and dirt-resistant without the use of PFCs
  • Meets UIAA standard water-repellent test, meaning this rope is fast-drying, absorbs virtually no water and resists freezing
name: Edelrid Eagle Light Eco Dry 9.5mm Rope
